welcome_message_title: Welcome to Santa Maria a Monte
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Santa Maria a Monte, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our city's charm and culture. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
